module.name: basin
module.desc: Defines shared watershed-wide and hydrologic response unit (HRU) physical parameters and variables

module.name: cascade
module.desc: Determines computational order of the HRUs and groundwater reservoirs for routing flow downslope

module.name: soltab
module.desc: Compute potential solar radiation and sunlight hours for each HRU for each day of year

module.name: obs
module.desc: Reads and stores observed data from all specified measurement stations

module.name: dynamic_param_read
module.desc: Reads and makes available dynamic parameters by HRU from pre-processed files

module.name: water_use_read
module.desc: Reads and makes available water-use data (diversions and gains) from pre-processed files

module.name: temp_1sta
module.desc: Distributes maximum and minimum temperatures to each HRU by using temperature data measured at one station and specified monthly lapse rates. Note, each HRU uses data from a single station, but, multiple stations can be used in a model with each HRU assigned data from one of those stations.

module.name: temp_sta
module.desc: Distributes maximum and minimum temperatures to each HRU by using temperature data measured at one station, similar to temp_1sta except there is no lapse rate.

module.name: temp_laps
module.desc: Distributes maximum and minimum temperatures to each HRU by computing a daily lapse rate with temperature data measured at a base station and a lapse station with differing altitudes.

module.name: temp_dist2
module.desc: Distributes maximum and minimum temperatures to each HRU by using a basin-wide lapse rate applied to the temperature data, adjusted for distance, measured at each station.

module.name: temp_map
module.desc: Distributes maximum and minimum temperatures to each HRU by using time series temperature data using an area-weighted method and correction factors to each HRU.

module.name: climate_hru
module.desc: Reads distributed minimum and maximum air temperature values for each HRU directly from pre-processed files.

module.name: precip_1sta
module.desc: Determines the form of precipitation and distributes it to each HRU by using monthly correction factors to account for differences in altitude, spatial variation, topography, and measurement gage efficiency and observed data from one station. Note, each HRU uses data from a single station, but, multiple stations can be used in a model with each HRU assigned data from one of those stations.

module.name: precip_laps
module.desc: Determines the form of precipitation and distributes it to each HRU by using monthly lapse rates.

module.name: precip_dist2
module.desc: Determines the form of precipitation and distributes it to each HRU by using an inverse distance weighting scheme.

module.name: precip_map
module.desc: Distributes precipitation and determines form to each HRU by using time series precipitation data using an area-weighted method and correction factors to each HRU.

module.name: climate_hru
module.desc: Reads distributed precipitation values for each HRU directly from pre-processed files.

module.name: ide_dist
module.desc: Determines the form of precipitation and distributes precipitation and temperatures to each HRU on the basis of measurements at stations with closest elevation or shortest distance to the respective HRU.

module.name: xyz_dist
module.desc: Determines the form of precipitation and distributes precipitation and temperatures to each HRU by using a multiple linear regression of measured data from a group of measurement stations or from atmospheric model simulation.

module.name: climate_hru
module.desc: Reads distributed minimum and maximum air temperature and precipitation values for each HRU directly from pre-processed files.

module.name: ddsolrad
module.desc: Distributes solar radiation to each HRU and estimates missing solar radiation data using a maximum temperature per degree-day relation.

module.name: ccsolrad
module.desc: Distributes solar radiation to each HRU and estimates missing solar radiation data using a relation between solar radiation and cloud cover.

module.name: climate_hru
module.desc: Reads distributed solar radiation values for each HRU directly from pre-processed files.

module.name: transp_frost
module.desc: Determines whether the current time step is in a period of active transpiration by the killing frost method.

module.name: transp_tindex
module.desc: Determines whether the current time step is in a period of active transpiration by the temperature index method.

module.name: climate_hru
module.desc: Reads distributed transpiration values for each HRU directly from pre-processed files.

module.name: potet_hamon
module.desc: Computes the potential evapotranspiration by using the Hamon formulation (Hamon, 1961).

module.name: potet_jh
module.desc: Computes the potential evapotranspiration by using the Jensen-Haise formulation (Jensen and Haise, 1963).

module.name: potet_hs
module.desc: Computes the potential evapotranspiration by using the Hargreaves-Samani formulation (Hargreaves and Samani, 1982).

module.name: potet_pt
module.desc: Computes the potential evapotranspiration by using the Priestley-Taylor formulation (Priestley and Taylor, 1972).

module.name: potet_pm
module.desc: Computes the potential evapotranspiration by using the Penman-Monteith formulation (Penman, 1948; Monteith, 1965); requires windspeed and humidity specified in CBH Files.

module.name: potet_pm_sta
module.desc: Computes the potential evapotranspiration by using the Penman-Monteith formulation (Penman, 1948; Monteith, 1965); requires windspeed and humidity specified in the Data File.

module.name: potet_pan
module.desc: Computes the potential evapotranspiration for each HRU by using pan-evaporation data.

module.name: climate_hru
module.desc: Reads distributed potential evapotranspiration values for each HRU directly from pre-processed files.

module.name: intcp
module.desc: Computes volume of intercepted precipitation, evaporation from intercepted precipitation, and throughfall that reaches the soil or snowpack.

module.name: snowcomp
module.desc: Initiates development of a snowpack and simulates snow accumulation and depletion processes by using an energy-budget approach.

module.name: glacr_melt
module.desc: Computes glacier dynamics using three linear reservoirs (snow, firn, ice) with time lapses and ability to advance or retreat according to volume-area scaling.

module.name: srunoff_smidx
module.desc: Computes surface runoff and infiltration for each HRU by using a nonlinear variable-source-area method allowing for cascading flow.

module.name: srunoff_carea
module.desc: Computes surface runoff and infiltration for each HRU by using a linear variable-source-area method allowing for cascading flow.

module.name: soilzone
module.desc: Computes inflows to and outflows from the soil zone of each HRU and includes inflows from infiltration, groundwater, and upslope HRUs, and outflows to gravity drainage, interflow, and surface runoff to down-slope HRUs.

module.name: gwflow
module.desc: Sums inflow to and outflow from PRMS groundwater reservoirs; outflow can be routed to downslope groundwater reservoirs and stream segments.

module.name: muskingum
module.desc: Computes flow in the stream network using the Muskingum routing method (Linsley and others, 1982).

module.name: muskingum_lake
module.desc: Computes flow in the stream network using the Muskingum routing method and flow and storage in on-channel lake using several methods.

module.name: muskingum_mann
module.desc: Computes flow in the stream network using the Muskingum routing method with Manningâ€™s N equation.

module.name: routing
module.desc: Computes common segment routing flows for modules strmflow_in_out and Muskingum.

module.name: stream_temp
module.desc: Computes daily mean stream temperature for each stream segment in the stream network, module based on the Stream Network Temperature Model (SNTEMP, Theurer and others, 1984).

module.name: strmflow
module.desc: Computes daily streamflow as the sum of surface runoff, shallow-subsurface flow (interflow), detention reservoir flow, and groundwater flow.

module.name: strmflow_in_out
module.desc: Routes water between segments in the stream network by setting the outflow to the inflow.

module.name: basin_sum
module.desc: Computes daily, monthly, yearly, and total flow summaries of volumes and flows for all HRUs.

module.name: basin_summary
module.desc: Write user-selected results for variables of dimension one to separate CSV Files at daily, monthly, mean monthly, mean yearly, and yearly total time steps when control parameter basinOutON_OFF is specified equal to 1.

module.name: convert_params
module.desc: Writes values for new PRMS-V parameters to a file based on a PRMS-IV Parameter File when control parameter model_mode is specified equal to CONVERT. Writes values for old PRMS-IV parameters to a file based on a PRMS-V Parameter File when control parameter model_mode is specified equal to CONVERT4.

module.name: frost_date
module.desc: Writes a parameter file of the last spring frost and first fall frost for each HRU based on the simulation time period and distributed temperature as required by the transp_frost module; land, subsurface, and stream processes are not computed.

module.name: map_results
module.desc: Writes HRU summaries to a user specified target map at weekly, monthly, yearly, and total time steps.

module.name: nhru_summary
module.desc: Writes user-selected results dimensioned by the value of dimension nhru to separate CSV Files at daily, monthly, mean monthly, mean yearly, and yearly total time steps when control parameter nhruOutON_OFF is specified equal to 1 or 2.

module.name: nsegment_summary
module.desc: Writes user-selected results dimensioned by the value of dimension nsegment to separate CSV Files at daily, monthly, mean monthly, mean yearly, and yearly total time steps when control parameter nsegmentOutON_OFF is specified equal to 1 or 2.

module.name: nsub_summary
module.desc: Writes user-selected results dimensioned by the value of dimension nsub to separate CSV Files at daily, monthly, mean monthly, mean yearly, and yearly total time steps when control parameter nsubOutON_OFF is specified equal to 1 or 2.

module.name: prms_summary
module.desc: Writes selected basin area-weighted results to a Comma-Seperated Values (CSV) File when control parameter csvON_OFF is specified equal to 1.

module.name: subbasin
module.desc: Computes streamflow at internal basin nodes and variables by subbasin.

module.name: write_climate_hru
module.desc: Writes climate-by-HRU Files of user-selected climate variables on the basis of distributed climate; land, subsurface, and stream processes are not computed.
